name: Treasure Cave (Pato Ingeniero)
description:
Life in the village is soooo boring... let's go. Join me on this adventure and I promise we'll find some awesome treasures on the way! How To Play

Play with WASD or arrow keys. Once you move you have to wait until you hit a wall to move again.

  • Try to get as much coins and diamonds as you can! Post your record on the comments!
  • Complete the 10 levels to have a big reward :)
  • If you get stuck on a level due to a bug, use the Restart Level button on the top right of the screen

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from Developer:

This was my first Game Jam experience, this game was done in under 48 hours of development. This was also my first experience creating a game with Godot, I just started learning it 3 months ago. I do have game development experience creating Flash games but last one I created was more than 6 years ago. I've been mainly focused on other types of software development (mobile apps and web). Since I graduated as a software engineer last year I have more time now and very recently I decided to come back to the Game Development world as a hobbie, and here I am :) 

During the week this game jam lasted I worked full-time on my day job and I worked hard on this game at night so it was a VERY exhausting week for me. I didn't do anything else other than work the hole week really to get done as much as I could for this game. But I think it was worth it. All in all I'm very proud of the results :)

During the development process I kept a Dev Log on a Google Docs that you can access here (but please play the game first since it contains spoilers!): Google Docs

Special Thanks to my girlfriend Vero that supported me the hole week, and to my brother Guille that created the music and sound effects for the game.

If you loved the music and sounds consider hiring him for your next project ;) Guillermo Dorfman - guillermodorfman@gmail.com


I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating it. If you do please leave a comment bellow :)
